Text: Jim Henson Pictures:  It was founded on July 21, 1995, as a joint venture between Jim Henson Productions and Sony Pictures Entertainment.
Triplets:<Jim Henson Pictures
2:
--------------------
Text: Jim Henson Pictures:  However, the company's films suffered from poor box office performances, which led to Sony breaking from the joint venture after the release of "The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland"; further films were released under the name of The Jim Henson Company, although they were credited under their former name on "Good Boy!
Triplets:<Jim Henson Pictures
